meanings.definition: Opposed to or against obscenity or indecency.
meanings.sent1: The antismut campaign aimed to clean up the city's billboards.
meanings.sent2: She always chose to read antismut books that were suitable for all ages.
meanings.sent3: The antismut group protested against the explicit content in the movie.
meanings.sent4: Her antismut stance made her a beacon of morality in the community.
meanings.sent5: The antismut policy in the library ensured a family-friendly environment.

meanings.definition: A person who is against the production or dissemination of smut or pornography.
meanings.sent1: The antismut spoke at the rally against adult content in magazines.
meanings.sent2: As an antismut, he actively campaigned for stricter censorship laws.
meanings.sent3: The antismut's collection of clean comics was the envy of his friends.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the antismut warrior, fighting for decency in media.
meanings.sent5: The antismut's dedication to purity inspired others to join the cause.
